Scroll Snap Type

# Scroll Snap Type

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                  | Support     |
| ---------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
snap-none
```      | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
snap-x
```         | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
snap-y
```         | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
snap-both
```      | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
snap-mandatory
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
snap-proximity
``` | 🌐 Web only |
